title: Educating Rita
creator_credit: Lewis Gilbert, Acorn Films and Rank Film Productions
brief_description: Based on the play of the same name by Willy Russell. Frank, a cynical and drunken professor of literature is appalled and then amused by the quest for knowledge and culture of one of his new students, a hairdresser named Rita. Frank soon finds that Rita has more zest for life and more natural intelligence than most of his “educated students”. Features Michael Caine and Julie Walters.
